contents.title: On Duty Hospitals Website (Flask)
text: Bachelor level project during "Web Information Systems" course. The goal of the project is the creation
of a website, which represents in real time, all the on-duty hospitals of Greece, as well as their contact
details. Moreover, the user has the opportunity to find information about COVID-19, virus that spread
worldwide during 2020 and 2021.

href.message: Please, find more information about the project:

contents.title: PERT Diagram & Economic Analysis of Project
text: Bachelor level project during "Software Systems Quality Assurance" course. The goal of the project is
the designing of a PERT diagram showing the construction of a project, using given construction times of the
individual projects, as well as the analysis of the results.
The second exercise of the project refers to the selection and economic analysis of two big projects,
based on the "Return on Investment" value after 7 years.

href.message: Please find the pronunciation and the solution of the project (only in greek):

contents.title: Leakage Discovery in Manholes (CLIPS)
text: Bachelor level project during "Knowledge Systems" course. The goal of the project is the creation of an
expert system using CLIPS, which deduces the location of a malfunction at a factory from a series of
measurements, that are entered into the program. Moreover, it constructs a given topology of manholes and
warehouses, as well as the characteristics of some chemicals, so that the program comes to a reliable
conclusion.

href.message: Please, find more information about the project:

contents.title: Maze Solution (JADE)
text: Bachelor level project during "Multi-Agent Systems" course. The goal of the project is the creation of
a multi-agent system using JADE technology. The program implements a maze game, where "agents" of the
program are collaborating to find the exit. In order for the goal to be accomplished, the algorithms
"Best-First Search" and "A* Search" are, also, being used.

href.message: Please, find more information about the project:

contents.title: S-DES Algorithm Implementation (Python)
text: Bachelor level project during "Network Security" course. The goal of the project is the implementation of
the cryptography algorithm named S-DES. Also, the project includes the decoding procedure of a message.
